title: CP9 DESTROYS WATER 7?! | One Piece Episode 245 & 246 REACTION
author: Unknown
description: A reaction video covering One Piece Episodes 245 and 246, focusing on the CP9 reveal and their confrontation with the Straw Hats in Water 7.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Episodes 245-246, including CP9 reveal and Lucci's transformation

title: One Piece: The Water 7 Saga is a Masterclass in Villains
author: Game Rant Editorial
description: An analytical article exploring how the Water 7 and Enies Lobby Arcs introduce CP9 as an extremely well-crafted group of villains. Discusses how CP9 members were disguised as normal citizens and their revelation as elite assassins.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby saga

title: One Piece: Water 7 Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Editorial
description: A comprehensive recap and review of the Water 7 arc, including the reveal that the masked attackers are members of CP9 and their mission to obtain the Pluton blueprints.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 arc

title: One Piece: Water 7 Arc Start Episode and Most Important Events
author: We Got This Covered Editorial
description: An article explaining how CP9 is introduced in the Water 7 arc, with the group hidden among shipwrights in Water 7, disguising themselves to retrieve the blueprints of the Ancient Weapon Pluton.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Water 7 arc events

title: Why is Nico Robin leaving the crew at Water 7?
author: Gear5World Editorial
description: An analysis article explaining Robin's motivations for leaving the Straw Hat crew, discussing how she was threatened by CP9 and chose to sacrifice herself to protect her companions from the World Government.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Robin's arc through Water 7 and Enies Lobby
